About_Hitbox.title: About Me
About_Hitbox.content: Hi, I'm Sharliz! I’m a creative problem solver who loves finding quick, effective solutions and bringing ideas to life. With experience in multimedia design and game development and an interest for UI/UX, I enjoy mixing technical skills with imagination to make things that are fun, useful, and visually engaging. I’m always up for trying new things, staying active, and finding inspiration in unexpected places. Whether it’s social media, game design, 3D art, event planning, marketing, or brand and product design, I’m excited to put my creativity to work in ways that make an impact.
